CommandPy Documentation¶

The CommandPy Documentation will solve your problems with the system you use, by providing an explanation to each command and patch notes.

CommandPy is a modern, simplistic and useful command prompt. It can be used for many purposes, from developers to general home-use.

Latest Version: 0.5

Support/Assistance¶

For support/assistance, you can use one of the following methods to contact the developer:

  • Discord

    • https://discord.gg/cuRVHC85Yb

  • Email

    • freddy.pashley@gmail.com

Installation¶

To install CommandPy, download the ZIP folder by clicking here.

Instructions for installation:

  1. Download the the ZIP folder

  2. Extract the ZIP folder

  3. Open the CommandPy.py file

Note: You must have Python 3.8 or later to be able to run this command prompt.

Commands¶

CLS¶

Clears the screen.

Syntax:

CLS

EXIT¶

Quits the CommandPy program (command interpreter).

Syntax:

EXIT

HELP¶

Provides help information for commands.

Syntax:

HELP [command]

IP¶

Shows all IP addresses detected in the network.

Syntax:

IP [/?]

PLATFORM¶

Platform and hardware information.

Syntax:

PLATFORM

CommandPy
